alert.note: Alert for Central Nevada - Toiyabe; Northern Nye County - Mojave; Western Elko County, northern Eureka and Lander Counties north of Interstate 80 (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 13 at 1:37AM PDT until July 13 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 426, 427, AND 438... The National Weather Service in Elko has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 9 AM this morning to 11 PM PDT this evening. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 426 Northern Nye County- Mojave, Fire Weather Zone 427 Central Nevada-Toiyabe, Fire Weather Zone 438 W Elko County and N Eureka and Lander Counties N of I80. * Winds...Southwest 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 10 percent.
info.instruction: A red flag warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Central Nevada - Toiyabe; Northern Nye County - Mojave; Western Elko County, northern Eureka and Lander Counties north of Interstate 80
